declare @tk varchar(32), @ngay_bc datetime, @so_ngay_cb int, @ed int, @ngay int, @current smalldatetime, @y int, @m int, @d int, @eom smalldatetime
select @current = getdate() select @y = year(@current), @m = month(@current), @d = day(@current) select @eom = dateadd(month, 1, cast(rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime)) - 1
select @ed = day(@eom)
select @ngay = case when ngay_cuoi_thang_bc = 0 then c_ngay_bc else @ed end from dmthongbao where ma_tb = '@@ma_tb' and status = '1' if @ngay > @ed select @ngay = @ed
select @tk = tk, @so_ngay_cb = so_ngay, @ngay_bc = case when type = 0 then d_ngay_bc when type = 1 then dateadd(day, c_ngay_bc_w - datepart(dw, @current), @current) + 1 when type = 2 then case when @d = @eom then @eom else dateadd(day, @ngay - @d, @current) end else @current end from dmthongbao where ma_tb = '@@ma_tb' and status = '1' select convert(varchar(10), @ngay_bc, 103) as date_from, @tk as tk, @so_ngay_cb as so_ngay
